attributes.action: Find the British peoples opinion on whether we want Scotland in the Union
attributes.background:
It seems strange that if Nicola Sturgeon keeps trying to take Scotland out of the Union the rest of us are not allowed to express our opinion.
Do we just accept their position  meekly? Do we have no pride?

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
